722735f-a.text:

1923.
Gift of E. M. Jenks.

722901f-b.text:
Riverside Park: The Hudson River Yacht Club at the foot of West 90th Atreet as viewed northeastward (No. 1) and southeastward (No. 27. Note in the latter the Soldiers and Sailors Monument. This is on the west
side of the Drive, at 89th Street.
The numerous apartnent houses shown forming a "Gold Coast", line the easterly side of this thoroughfare and overlook both the park and the river.
July 11. 1931
Views: 1-2
P. L. Sperr
(3)
A view northward of the same locale, from a point
near 88th Street.
July 11, 1931
P. L. Sperr
